mapper.insert: insert into ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE(ID_, CATEGORY_, NAME_, KEY_, VERSION_, DEPLOYMENT_ID_, RESOURCE_NAME_, DESCRIPTION_, TENANT_ID_) values (#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deploymentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE set CATEGORY_ = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID_ = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE where KEY_ = #{parameter.decisionTableKey} and VERSION_ = #{parameter.decisionTableVersion} and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null)

select * from ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE where KEY_ = #{key} and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null) and VERSION_ = (select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE where KEY_ = #{decisionTableKey} and (TENANT_ID_ = '' or TENANT_ID_ is null))

select * from ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE where KEY_ = #{decisionTableKey} and TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId} and VERSION_ = (select max(VERSION_) from ${prefix}DMN_DECISION_TABLE where KEY_ = #{decisionTableKey} and TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId})
